column19: Enjoy smoked turkey at its finest! You get much more of the moist, tender, all white breast meat than you would from a whole turkey and you don't need to deal with all those bones as we leave in only the breast bone to enhance the flavor. Each turkey breast is slowly smoked over hardwood embers for a full 24 hours, and weighs four to five and a half pounds. Enjoy hot or cold. Absolutely delicious! Serves 6-8 people and comes with a sturdy Bamboo cutting board firebranded with your logo.

column7: Spiral-Sliced Half Ham with Bamboo Cutting Board
column19: These hams are cured in a special blend of herbs and spices, then slowly smoked over hardwood embers for a full 24 hours, giving them a rare, mouth-watering flavor. Spiral-slicing right to the bone allows each slice to lift away easily (they'll love you for making it so simple), and when the lucky recipient takes the first bite, your gift will be recognized for its outstanding quality. Each ham is shipped with an eco-friendly Bamboo cutting board with your imprint.  Half hams weigh 6-8 lbs.

column19: You can taste the rich, hickory smoked flavor in every slice of this superb three to four pound ham. It's accented by a honey cure that gives it a mild, sweet flavor. Fully cooked, ready-to-eat, low in salt and completely boneless... it's spiral-sliced the way ham should be! Your guests will be impressed and if you end up with leftovers... don't worry. Your future holds some of the best ham sandwiches you've ever tasted. Serve at room temperature or gently warm in the oven. Each ham comes with a sturdy Bamboo cutting board. The cutting board, firebranded with your logo, will be a year-long reminder of this delicious gift. Serves 6-8.

column19: Four gourmet favorites in one festive tower. We start with our signature English Butter Toffee, made with plenty of dairy-fresh butter, rich chocolate and California Almonds; then add a dozen scrumptious Pecan Turtles with creamy caramel centers and hand-picked Pecans, Extra Fancy Cashews that are freshly roasted and lightly salted; and finally, Gourmet Chocolate Sea Salt Caramel Corn. This Tower of Favorites is available in your choice of our Gold Striped boxes with burgundy ribbon and gold imprint, Burgundy & Gold boxes with burgundy ribbon and gold imprint, and Black & Silver boxes with black ribbon and silver imprint. Wow! What a treat! Serves 7-10.

column19: "It's better to give than to receive," as the saying goes; but this tower is a great argument for the opposite! It's the perfect way to send your greetings, say "Thank you", or show your appreciation! This tower holds the most sumptuous treats one could ever desire. We start with our signature English Butter Toffee, Cocoa Dusted Truffles, Chocolate Covered Almonds, and Chocolate Sea Salt Caramels; then add Chocolate Sea Salt Caramel Corn and Jumbo Pretzels dipped in Chocolate – White, Milk, and Dark. A ribbon foil-stamped with your logo ties it all together. Serves 9-14.

column19: If you're like me, you can never find a Post-it® note pad on your desk. I can have a half dozen one day, and the next day they're gone! Our Post-it® note holder crafted from American Beech is the solution. It keeps a note pad close at hand. We apply a hand-rubbed natural oil finish to bring out the natural beauty of the wood, then firebrand your logo on the holder. Of course, we include your choice of six-ounces of crunchy Virginia Peanuts, five-ounces of lightly-salted Extra Fancy Jumbo Cashews, or five-ounces of our famous Chocolate Covered Almonds.

column7: Extra Fancy Jumbo Cashews in Premium Delights Gift Box
column19: These jumbo, great tasting, freshly roasted, extra fancy cashews are some of the very finest in the world.  We roast them carefully to make sure they are extra crunchy, then lightly salt them to bring out that real, honest-to-goodness flavor.  Cashews are a great source of magnesium, selenium, zinc and iron.  Each box contains five-ounces.  Your choice of dark navy, bright red, metallic blue, or silver gift boxes are foil-stamped with your logo. Navy and red gift boxes are complete with your choice of gold imprint with gold bow or silver imprint with silver bow. Metallic blue gift boxes are complete with a silver imprint and silver bow.  Silver gift boxes are complete with a black imprint and silver bow.

column7: Choice Virginia Peanuts in Premium Delights Gift Box
column19: If you’ve never had Virginia peanuts before, you’ll be amazed at their crunchiness and flavor.  We roast them in golden peanut oil, lightly salt them to maintain their distinctive flavor and healthy qualities, then package them at once in an air-tight bag to lock in the crunchiness.  Each box contains six-ounces.  Your choice of metallic blue or silver gift boxes are foil-stamped with your logo. Metallic blue gift boxes are complete with a silver imprint and silver bow.  Silver gift boxes are complete with a black imprint and silver bow.

column7: Pecan Turtles in Premium Delights Gift Box

Each box contains 12 turtles.  Your choice of dark navy, bright red, metallic blue, or silver gift boxes are foil-stamped with your logo. Navy and red gift boxes are complete with your choice of gold imprint with gold bow or silver imprint with silver bow. Metallic blue gift boxes are complete with a silver imprint and silver bow. column7: Toffee & Turtles in Gold Gift Box

Rich, mouth-watering Pecan Turtles made with creamy caramel, full-flavored Southern pecans, and premium chocolate come packed with our signature English Butter Toffee. column19: Our thick and chewy home-style cookies and brownies are reminiscent of those from your grandmother's kitchen! Made from scratch, using old family recipes, they'll bring a smile to the face of every lucky recipient! We include: Chocolate Chunk; White Chocolate Macadamia; and Snicker-doodle cookies; and Double Chocolate, White Chocolate Raspberry, Chocolate Pecan, and Chocolate Butterscotch Coconut brownies. Great for sharing at the office or at home. Best of all, they're individually wrapped to lock-in that fresh-from-the-oven goodness.  Your choice of two or three dozen in all! They're packed in our cork-like basket with faux leather trim, and tied with a sheer burgundy ribbon with your logo or message.

column20: I’m known around our office for not liking peanut butter (I can’t stand the stuff), but when I tasted these Chocolate Peanut Butter Meltaways I exclaimed, “These are great! column7: English Butter Toffee in Wooden Collector's Box
column19: For over 25 years, our customers (and the recipients of their gifts) have raved about our signature English Butter Toffee! We begin with a crunchy toffee center made with plenty of pure, dairy-fresh butter. Then we enrobe each piece in rich, premium chocolate. Finally, we cover it with toasted almonds. With nearly 36 pieces in this one-pound box, there's plenty to share with friends and family... but don't be surprised if they want to keep it all for themselves. We package this great tasting toffee in our useful wooden collector's box imprinted with your logo.

column7: English Butter Toffee in Magnetic Gift Box
column19: For over 25 years, our customers (and the recipients of their gifts) have raved about our signature English Butter Toffee! We begin with a crunchy toffee center made with plenty of pure, dairy-fresh butter. Then we enrobe each piece in rich, premium chocolate. Finally, we cover it with toasted almonds. With nearly 36 pieces in this one-pound box, there's plenty to share with friends and family... but don't be surprised if they want to keep it all for themselves. We'll package this great tasting toffee in your choice of our navy blue or red magnetic closure gift box. Choose gold or silver for your logo and we will add a matching bow.

column19: This tablet stand is perfect for an iPad® or almost any other tablet. It has precisely cut grooves that hold your tablet upright, either vertically or horizontally. Each tablet stand is crafted from hard maple, has a hand-rubbed, natural oil finish, measures 5.375" x 3.625" x .75" and is made in the U.S.A. We firebrand your logo and then pack with one of the following gourmet treats: Jelly Belly® Jelly Beans, Extra Fancy Jumbo Cashews, English Butter Toffee, Pecan Turtles, or Chocolate Covered Almonds.
